Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Fixed function to maintain column name when removing all but one column.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.

Addressed an edge case in label assignment

2 problems can occur when assigning labels based on max row labels.
- If a single group gets split into 2 clusters, the confusion matrix ends up with 2 `1s` in a column. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
- If a cluster boundary perfectly splits a known group, you'll end up with duplicates in a row. Throws a warning and doesn't name clusters.
